Job Description    Industry/ Organization Type: Education / International   Position Title: Cook cum Cleaner   Working Location: Punggol / Bukit Panjang / Jurong West / Yio Chu Kang   Working Hours: 5 days, Monday – Friday (7:30 am – 5 pm) / Occasionally Saturday (8:30 am – 12:30 pm)   Salary: Basic + Lunch included + Performance incentive up to 1.5 months + Leaves + Other benefits   Duration: Contract or Permanent  Key Responsibilities    Prepare breakfast, lunch and snacks for children according to the menu of the centre, coordinate food orders for the centre, and keep stock of kitchen supplies.   Clean and wash kitchen pantry, crockery, cutlery, utensils, dining areas, tables and chairs.   Assist in upkeep and cleanliness of kitchen and other school areas where required and assigned by superior.   Prepare food, snacks and beverages for parents and children during school events or marketing activities.   Perform any other duties assigned by your superiors.  APPLY NOW!!!    Comfortable working in a Preschool/ Childcare setting (children).   Previous cooking experience is preferred.   Physically fit to carry and move equipment/supplies when necessary.  Please apply through ANY of the following methods:    Submit your application by clicking the APPLY button;   Email your resume to Job(at)anradus.com.sg. Please indicate #64822 on the email subject.  Anradus Policy: This clarifies Anradus' working procedures, from receiving the applicant's resume, screening to shortlisting. We assure you our consultants will go through every resume we receive but we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Anradus Pte Ltd | EA License No. 20C0161 | Adelin Chong | EA Reg No.: R1875641

jobs.description: preparation of south indian ; north indian curies   Prepare and cook all meals,      e.g. lunch, tea and dinner by following the daily menu planned   To be responsible for      ordering all vegetables daily and meaty goods weekly through your      immediate supervisor   Ready to cook Goring items      (nasi,ikanpils,mee,kwithya,noodles)   Handling multiple food      orders at one time, Delivering food order to wait staff in a timely manner   Sanitizing and cleaning work      stations and utensils   Assisting other cooks in      preparing food or helping other team members when needed   Ready to work any shift,      Able to work in a fast-paced environment   Responsible for cleaning of      cutlery/utensils after every meal   Able to multitask,      prioritize, and manage time efficiently, Physical endurance to stand for      an entire shift   To ensure that all food are      properly cooked and kept in a most hygienic condition   Previous experience as a      cook, or relevant work experience   Able to work early mornings,      nights, and weekends

jobs.description: To cook and distribute lunch and dinner for the resident and staff.   To wash up all dirty cooking utensils in the kitchen.   To wash and cut all raw food and fruits as required for the day’s meals.   To assist in clearing up all leftover food, drinks, etc. after each meal.   To sort out donated vegetables and store them as per the requirement.   To perform any other cooking or kitchen duties as required by the Kitchen Ops Supervisor.

· At least 10 years experience  · Willing to work on holidays / work on shifts / change of shift  · Able to stand/work for long hours    1 COOK FOOD IN A TIMELY MANNER  2 SET UP THE KITCHEN WITH COOKING EQUIPMENT, LIKE KNIVES, PANS AND FOOD SCALES  3 STUDY EACH RECIPE AND GATHERING ALL NECESSARY INGREDIENTS  4 WORK TOGETHER WITH KITCHEN STAFF AND DELEGATE TASKS RELATED TO MEAL PREP, COOKING AND DELIVERING FOOD TO DINERS IN A TIMELY FASHION  5 FOLLOW THE BUDGET ESTABLISHED BY THE RESTAURANT MANAGER  6 ENSURE SAFETY AND SANITATION PRACTICES IN THE KITCHEN  7 KEEP UP WITH INDUSTRY TRENDS AND CREATE NEW RECIPES

Preparing and assembling ingredients for menu items.   Preparing high-quality meals and food items according to company recipes.   Storing excess food at the correct temperature in order to avoid spoilage.   Ensuring that food portions and food presentation meet company standards.   Monitoring supplies and re-ordering stock as needed.   Ensuring that cooking utensils are clean before each use.   Cleaning and sterilizing food preparation areas.   Assisting other cooks to ensure that food orders are completed in a timely manner.   Efficiently resolving problems with customers’ orders.   Ensuring that food health and safety regulations are followed.

jobs.description: Responsibilities:    Involve in kitchen operations from food preparation to final production   Set up workstations with all needed ingredients and cooking equipment   Prepare ingredients to use in cooking (chopping, peeling vegetables, cutting meat etc)   Ensure kitchen cleanliness, and hygiene standards are maintained   Manage kitchen stock for daily operation and food cost control   Ensure kitchen stock keep fresh and follow FEFO (first expired first out) standard   Assist on month-end stock take   Any other ad-hoc duties as assigned by the Company  Requirements:    Able to perform spilt shift, work on weekends and public holidays   Have initiative and hardworking with positive attitude to learn and contribute   Possess good communication and interpersonal skills

1. Daily Operations: • Assist Chef in cooking  • Preparation of food ingredients  • Preparation and cleaning of kitchen equipment  • Ensure cleanliness of kitchen equipment  • Maintain a high quality of hygiene, health and safety in the kitchen  • Responsible for kitchen floor cleanliness and sanitary item  • Handles all cooking material and equipment and keeps it well cleaned  • Weekly refrigerator ; chiller cleaning  2. Food Safety / Sanitation: · Serve food ; beverages in accordance to Restaurant and regulatory standards. · Ensure cleanliness and work order in compliance with standards at all times.  3. Others: · Understand and adheres to workplace safety. · Perform any other additional responsibilities as assigned.  Requirements: i. Candidate must possess at least a ‘N’ or ‘O’ level, PMR/SPM qualification or equivalent. ii. Able to communicate in English and maintain good relationship with diverse customers. iii. A good team player to maintain good working relationship amongst staff in the Restaurant. iv. Ability to engage in physical activities which requires long hours of standing during shift. v. Self-discipline and self-motivated. Enjoys interacting with people and serving guests. Possess enthusiasm in learning and keen to get feedback for improvement. vi. Always maintain high standard of personal hygiene, neatly attired. vii. Possess enthusiasm in learning and keen to get feedback for improvement. viii. Require to work on rotating shift basis which include weekends and public holidays.
